callback_with_context.context_function_id: ( target_mission = PlayersFaction.ActiveMissionList.Filter( (mission) => HasZoomLocation && (TargetCharacterContext == this) ).FirstContext ) => { GetIf( IsValidContext(target_mission) && target_mission.MissionRecordContext.EventCategoryContext.CategoryKey == "Arbaal_map_easy" || target_mission.MissionRecordContext.EventCategoryContext.CategoryKey == "Arbaal_map_medium" || target_mission.MissionRecordContext.EventCategoryContext.CategoryKey == "Arbaal_map_hard", GetIfElse(target_mission.MissionRecordContext.EventCategoryContext.CategoryKey == "Arbaal_map_easy", "ui\skins\default\dlc26_wrath_of_khorne\arbaal_wrath_khorne_difficulty_easy.png", GetIfElse(target_mission.MissionRecordContext.EventCategoryContext.CategoryKey == "Arbaal_map_medium", "ui\skins\default\dlc26_wrath_of_khorne\arbaal_wrath_khorne_difficulty_medium.png", "ui\skins\default\dlc26_wrath_of_khorne\arbaal_wrath_khorne_difficulty_hard.png")) ) }

active.name: active
active.tooltip: Send a warning to the trespassing faction to leave your territory at once. If they fail to leave in {{CcoCampaignMilitaryForce:TrespassGracePeriod}} round(s), you can declare war on them without having to suffer treachery penalties for breaking [[img:icon_non-aggression_pact]][[/img]]non-aggression pacts and [[img:icon_trade_agreement]][[/img]]trade agreements.

button_trespass_warning.componentleveltooltip: This army is trespassing, but you cannot issue a trespass warning for {{CcoCampaignMilitaryForce:PlayersFaction.TresspassWarningCooldown}} turn(s)

active.name: active
active.tooltip: Send a warning to the trespassing faction to leave your territory at once. If they fail to leave in {{CcoCampaignMilitaryForce:TrespassGracePeriod}} round(s), you can declare war on them without having to suffer treachery penalties for breaking [[img:icon_non-aggression_pact]][[/img]]non-aggression pacts and [[img:icon_trade_agreement]][[/img]]trade agreements.

countdown_to_no_penalty.name: countdown_to_no_penalty
countdown_to_no_penalty.tooltip: If this army fails to leave in {{CcoCampaignMilitaryForce:TrespassGracePeriod}} round(s), you can declare war on them without having to suffer treachery penalties for breaking [[img:icon_non-aggression_pact]][[/img]]non-aggression pacts and [[img:icon_trade_agreement]][[/img]]trade agreements.

no_penalty_to_attack.name: no_penalty_to_attack
no_penalty_to_attack.tooltip: This army has trespassed against you. You can declare war on this faction without suffering treachery penalties for breaking [[img:icon_non-aggression_pact]][[/img]]non-aggression pacts and [[img:icon_trade_agreement]][[/img]]trade agreements.

on_cooldown.name: on_cooldown
on_cooldown.tooltip: This army is trespassing, but you cannot issue a trespass warning for {{CcoCampaignMilitaryForce:PlayersFaction.TrespassWarningCooldown}} turn(s).

dev_faction_icon_for_minimal_mode.comment: Only shows when using minimal mode tweaker for dev purposes to make easier to use

dy_champions_essence.comment: Needs visibility setter even if it gets trashed when invalid, cause otherwise army banner callback assumes that it will be handled in code and hides it

dy_meat.comment: Needs visibility setter even if it gets trashed when invalid, cause otherwise army banner callback assumes that it will be handled in code and hides it

hidden_army.componentleveltooltip: This army is hidden from enemies

wh2_dlc11_cst_vampire_coast.name: wh2_dlc11_cst_vampire_coast
wh2_dlc11_cst_vampire_coast.tooltip: Pirate Crew||This army has access to shipbuilding.

wh_main_dwf_dwarfs.name: wh_main_dwf_dwarfs
wh_main_dwf_dwarfs.tooltip: The Spirit of Grungni||Malakai's army has access to Airship buildings.

icon_available_war_coord_target.comment: Show if can target and not already the target
Show if can target and not already the target

icon_can_loan.componentleveltooltip: This army can be loaned from {{CcoCampaignMilitaryForce:FactionContext.Name}}

icon_loan.componentleveltooltip: Turns until army is returned to {{CcoCampaignMilitaryForce:FactionLoanedFromContext.Name}}

newstate.name: NewState
newstate.tooltip: Turns remaining until garrison is wiped out from [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition

naval_transport.componentleveltooltip: At Sea||This army is currently at sea, using a fleet of transport ships.

seductive_influence_tracker.comment: Property setter is for handling sort, we do +1 so that those without resource at least sorted above those without resource
